game_description: Stimulus is a new way to learn that challenges traditional methods of e-learning. Stimulus is a social platform where people can explore, create and share with each other. Stimulus incorporates the most up-to-date learning theories in a virtual environment that allows learners to collaborate and share new ideas. Host training classes, workshops, conferences, and presentations in a private & safe multi-user environment, no matter which device you are on. AVAILABLE ON: Windows PC ( VR and Desktop Mode) Oculus Quest
